title: Best of Friends
description: Tiger and Lily hissed at each other. They were enemies. Will they become the best of friends? Best of Friends provides the opportunity to practice retelling and identifying cause-and-effect relationships. Repetitive language and high-frequency words make this a great book for emergent readers.
meta: different, enemies, friends, hissed, raced, waking
Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand and remember story events
Cause and Effect : Identify cause and effect
Proper Nouns : Identify and use proper nouns

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
